author: Staff Reporter
text:
A day after Nalini Sriharan, one of the convicts in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case underwent a medical check-up at the Government Vellore Medical College Hospital (GVMCH), Adukkamparai, another convict, V.Sriharan alias Murugan was examined by a five-member team from the hospital, at the Vellore Central Prison for Men on Friday.

Five-member team

The team consisted of two doctors - an ophthalmologist and a dentist. A refractionist and two paramedical staff were also part of the team. They went to the prison in an ambulance, a hospital authority said.

Routine check-up

“We usually send a medical team to the prison if requested. The team did a routine medical check-up for Murugan inside the prison,” he said.

Sources said Murugan had complained of vision problem.
title: Medical team examines Rajiv case convict
